snippet: Club doctors will have the final say on whether a player stays on the field after a head injury during English Premier League matches as part of new guidelines on concussions.
abstract: Club doctors will have final say on whether player stays on field after a head injury during English Premier League matches as part of new guidelines on concussions; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Club doctors will have the final say on whether a player stays on the field after a head injury during English Premier League matches as part of new guidelines on concussions.

headline.main: New Protocol for Head Injuries in English Premier League
